AUTHOR: Pwnulatr
INSTALL_MSG:
Successfully installed the isit cog.
Use [p]isit to get a list of holidays you can query
NAME: Isitchristmas
SHORT: Gives a yes/no response for a holiday if it is or isn't that holiday
DESCRIPTION:
Gives a yes/no response for a holiday if it is or isn't that holiday.
Will hopefully support adding holidays and possibly holiday notifications in the future.
